org.bytemechanics.metrics.crawler.sensors.stack

Class LongStackSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytemechanics.metrics.crawler.sensors.AbstractSensor<TYPE>
      • org.bytemechanics.metrics.crawler.sensors.stack.AbstractStackSensor<TYPE>
        • org.bytemechanics.metrics.crawler.sensors.stack.AbstractManualStackSensor<Long>
          • org.bytemechanics.metrics.crawler.sensors.stack.LongStackSensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class LongStackSensor
extends AbstractManualStackSensor<Long>
    Long stack sensor (must be informed manually)
    Usage:
      try(LongSensor sensor=LongSensor.get("myMeasure{}",1)){
		(...)
		sensor.setMeasure(1l)
		try(LongSensor sensor2=LongSensor.get("myMeasure2{}",2)){
			(...)
			sensor.setMeasure(2l)
			(...)
		}
  }
    That will create two metrics:
    • myMeasure11=1l
    • myMeasure11.myMeasure22=2l
    or
      try(LongSensor sensor=LongSensor.get(1l,"myMeasure{}",1)){
		(...)
		try(LongSensor sensor2=LongSensor.get("myMeasure2{}",2)){
			(...)
			sensor.setMeasure(2l)
			(...)
		}
		try(LongSensor sensor3=LongSensor.get(3l,"myMeasure3{}",3)){
			(...)
		}
  }
    That will create three metrics:
    • myMeasure11=1l
    • myMeasure11.myMeasure22=2l
    • myMeasure11.myMeasure33=3l
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    afarre
    See Also:
    AbstractManualStackSensor

        protected LongStackSensor(Optional<Long> _measure,

        Builds a long sensor with the name build from the given name and arguments and with the given measure
        Example:
                _name: "{}_name_{}"
        _args: ["prefix","suffix"]
        final name: prefix_name_suffix
        Parameters:
        _measure - Optional of long that will be the measure to use (can be null or Optional.empty())
        _name - name of the measure
        _args - arguments to replace to the measure name
